diff:
diff --git a/fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/type1/Type1Lexer.java b/fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/type1/Type1Lexer.java
index 56aaf64ad..0e7f55d1a 100644
--- a/fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/type1/Type1Lexer.java
+++ b/fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/type1/Type1Lexer.java
@@ -501,6 +501,15 @@ class Type1Lexer
      */
     private Token readCharString(int length) throws IOException
     {
+        // Validate length to prevent OutOfMemoryError from malicious input
+        // Maximum reasonable size for a CharString is 65535 bytes (64KB)
+        // This is sufficient for legitimate Type 1 font data
+        if (length < 0 || length > 65535)
+        {
+            throw new IOException("Invalid CharString length: " + length +
+                                " (must be between 0 and 65535)");
+        }
+
         try
         {
             buffer.get(); // space
